text: Small Medium Enterprise Development Bank Malaysia Berhad, commonly known as SME Bank is a Malaysian small and medium enterprise (SME) banking company owned by Minister of Finance Incorporated. The bank's main activity is to provide financial assistance and expertise to small and medium enterprises. Aria Putera Ismail is the CEO of the bank since September 3, 2018. ==See also== * List of banks in Malaysia ==References== ==External links== * Category:Banks of Malaysia Category:Banks established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Malaysia Category:Companies based in Kuala Lumpur Category:Minister of Finance (Incorporated) (Malaysia)
title: SME Bank
